body:
Ok, I think this is ready to go, though there are a few things I'm going to file follow ups for.

"Normandy" is now the collection of projects. "recipe-server" is what normandy used to be, "recipe-client-addon" is the system add-on, etc.

Most of this is just moved from the other repos, and you can safely ignore almost all the commits. The commits to look at start with "Monorepo CI framework". Things to look at especially are the contents of `bin/ci` at the top level, and in every project's directory, as well as READMEs in the same places.

Remaining issues:

* CI artifacts aren't properly gathered by CircleCI yet, so we don't have complete failure details.
* Docs need rewritten. Only recipe-server had any docs to speak of, but they need to be reorganized and re-worded. I'd also like to put set-up and development docs for every project on readthedocs, instead of in READMEs.
* The badges in the README are probably broken, and need looking into, but I think that must wait until this merges, so the tools can pick up on the organization.
* Probably a million other things that will pop up as we work through this.
